question:

Fill in the blank spaces in the following sentences making use of the best of the five option:
By the end of the next semester he .... his University education
explanation:
'By the time' indicates the time of completion of an action in the future.

The auxiliary verb form should be will/shall plus the past participle form of the main verb.

Traditionally, 'will' is used with the first person pronoun and 'shall' is used with the second and third person pronoun
